thread.title: Spicer Ends White House Press Briefing With Tom Brady Joke [VIDEO]
thread.title_full: Spicer Ends White House Press Briefing With Tom Brady Joke [VIDEO]

author: Christian Datoc
title: Spicer Ends White House Press Briefing With Tom Brady Joke [VIDEO]
text:
5545095 
Sean Spicer ended Tuesday’s White House press briefing with a joke about Mexico. 
Well, more specifically, the Mexican journalist identified as Tom Brady’s Super Bowl jersey thief, but whatever. (VIDEO: Brady Jersey Thief Caught On Camera) 
WATCH: 
“I will see you tomorrow,” President Trump’s spokesman told reporters as he prepared to exit the briefing room. “We are going to have a week full of briefings. I’m excited.” 
“By the way,” Spicer added with a smile. “I’m very happy that the individual in the press corp who took Tom Brady’s jersey that that has been returned properly.” 
“Another bat on the press, but we have righted that wrong.”
